name: Driving Italian
description:
Driving Italian is an endless driving game, but you must cause near accidents to get points. You do this by cutting off other traffic or by almost crashing into the back of them. The closer you get, the more points you earn. If you get really close, then the bar in the top left turns green and you get +50%.

There are six different types of cars; including famous ones like Lambo Aventador, Ferrari 458 and generic van with racing stripes. The cars drive at varying speeds, so how does the traffic not crash into one another?

The game was inspired by a roadtrip to Italy last summer. Their impeccable ability to have near accidents on narrow mountain roads needed to be turned into a game.

Total development time: 19 hours
